body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

body.when: Any phase, just after you make an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test or a Hazardous test for a unit from your army, or a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll or a saving throw for a model in that unit, or a roll to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon equipped by a model in that unit. If you are using fast dice rolling, this Stratagem can still be used after rolling multiple rolls or saving throws at once.
body.target: That unit or model from your army.
body.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw. If you are using fast dice rolling, select one of those rolls or saving throws to re-roll.

body.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
body.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just before you take a Battle-shock test for a unit from your army.
body.target: That unit from your army.
body.effect: Your unit automatically passes that Battle-shock test.
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
body.restriction: You can only select a VEHICLE unit from your army if it is a WALKER. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Your unit fights next.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, and select one VEHICLE model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. Roll a number of D6 equal to the Toughness characteristic of the selected VEHICLE model. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: End of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, and if every model in that unit has the Deep Strike ability, you can set that unit up as described in the Deep Strike ability (even though it is not your Movement phase).
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive on the battlefield during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, or declares a charge.
body.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is visible to your unit, your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
body.restriction: You cannot target a TITANIC unit with this Stratagem. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One SMOKE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover and the Stealth ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One GRENADES unit from your army (excluding units that Advanced, Fell Back or have shot this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one GRENADES model in your unit and one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES model. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One of your active Secondary Mission cards.
body.effect: Discard it and draw one new Secondary Mission card.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One of your active Secondary Mission cards.
body.effect: Discard it and draw one new Secondary Mission card.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One of your active Secondary Mission cards.
body.effect: Discard it and draw one new Secondary Mission card.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that has just destroyed the unit you selected at the start of your Command phase as the target of your Assemblage of Might ability.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit on the battlefield Until the start of your next Command phase, each time an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army makes an attack that target that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll In addition, if the destroyed unit was a CHARACTER unit, gain 1CP.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, CHARACTER models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER units from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a CHARACTER model in either of your units makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed and has not fought this phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not remove your destroyed model from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army that is not leading a unit.
body.effect: Select one friendly unit (excluding Battle-shocked and Attached units) within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your model that it could lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet). Your model attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet or from an Enhancement that says it can only be used Once per battle.
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES WARLORD model.
body.effect: Your model can use its Once per battle’ ability one additional time during this battle (but not in the same phase).
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per battle.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by an additional 1.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One VIGILATORS, ALEYA or KNIGHT-CENTURA equipped with an executioner greatblade unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model from your army has used an ability on its datasheet that states it can only be used ‘once per battle’.
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model.
body.effect: Your model can use that ‘once per battle’ ability one additional time during the battle (but not in the same phase).
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem on the same ADEPTUS CUSTODES CHARACTER model more than once per battle.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that model has the CHARACTER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is treated as having 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ALLARUS CUSTODIANS or AQUILON CUSTODIANS unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: That unit is split into separate units, each containing one model. These new units each have a Starting Strength of 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One WITCHSEEKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit. If such a weapon targets a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit this phase, add 2 to its Attacks characteristic instead.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One VIGILATORS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll If the target of that attack is Battle-shocked or a PSYKER, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability, but models in your unit can only target PSYKER units with their attacks.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability, and Battle-shocked and PSYKER models can only select your unit as a target of a ranged attack if they are within 12".

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PROSECUTORS unit from your army that has just shot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while your unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is prosecuted. While a unit is prosecuted, each time an ANATHEMA PSYKANA model makes an attack against that unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. While a PSYKER or Battle-shocked unit is prosecuted, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Any phase, just after an enemy PSYKER unit has either finished using a Psychic ability that targets a unit, or finished making Psychic Attacks.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit from your army within 18" of that enemy PSYKER unit.
body.effect: That enemy PSYKER unit must take a Leadership test If the test is passed, that PSYKER unit is Battle-shocked; if the test is failed that PSYKER unit suffers 3 mortal wounds and is Battle-shocked.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

body.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound has been allocated to an ADEPTUS CUSTODES model from your army(excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA models).
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES model’s unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is within range of an objective marker you control and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that Fell Back this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of your turn, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES BATTLELINE unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that is below its Starting Strength.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. If your unit is Below Half-strength, until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those melee weapons instead.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the WALKER keyword. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks (when doing so, it is assumed to have 1 wound remaining), and is then removed from play.

body.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army Piles In.
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3".

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit from your army Advances.
body.target: That ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the WALKER keyword, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced instead.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES VEHICLE or ADEPTUS CUSTODES MOUNTED unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army that are within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your units can make a Normal move of up to 6".
body.restriction: You cannot select units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of your units targets an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll.
body.restriction: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit within 6" of that ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic attacks and mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY units from your army, and one enemy unit that is an eligible target for all of those units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your units can only target that enemy unit, but each time a model in one of your units makes a ranged attack, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1.
body.restriction: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one other friendly ADEPTUS CUSTODES INFANTRY unit (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) within 6" of that ANATHEMA PSYKANA INFANTRY unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, any attack that targets your ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit must instead target your other ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit (unless it is not an eligible target).

body.when: Start of your Movement phase.
body.target: Up to two ADEPTUS CUSTODES units from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your units are eilgible to shoot and/or declare a charge in a turn in which they Fell Back.
body.restriction: You can only select two units if one (and only one) of them is an ANATHEMA PSYKANA unit and both are within 6" of each other.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding ballistus grenade launchers) have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting units within 6".

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there. In addition, any Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That ALLARUS CUSTODIANS unit.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit from your army (excluding ANATHEMA PSYKANA units) that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can ignore Walls and other models for the purposes of determining which enemy units are visible to its own.
One eligible unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was hit by one or more of those attacks can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
Until the end of the turn, enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at that unit.
Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".
Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.
One eligible unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
Until the end of the phase, add D6+l" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

body.when: Start of the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and is in Strategic Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability. When your unit is set up on the battlefield using the Deep Strike ability, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but if it does, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge. In addition, if your unit is a TRANSPORT, each unit that disembarks from it this turn must be set up more than 6" horizontally from all enemy units and until the end of the turn, is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
body.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY and was selected as a target of that charge.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll, one Wound roll and one Damage roll made for a model in your unit. If you are using fast dice rolling, you can select one of those rolls to re-roll before moving onto the next step of the attack sequence.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army that can FLY Falls Back.
body.target: That AELDARI FLY VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI TRANSPORT unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, units can disembark from your TRANSPORT after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally.

body.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an AELDARI VEHICLE unit from your army.
body.target: That AELDARI VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill, Weapon skill, Strength, Armour Penetration and Damage characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, select one of the following abilities, or select two of the following abilities if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem: [IGNORES COVER], [LETHAL HITS], [SUSTAINED HITS 1]. Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected abilities.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One AVATAR OF KHAINE model from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model’s Wailing Doom ranged weapon has a Range characteristic of 18" and a Damage characteristic of 8.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
body.effect: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: All models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if that enemy unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ASPECT WARRIORS or AVATAR OF KHAINE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can remove one Aspect Shrine token your unit has (see datasheets). Then, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if you removed an Aspect Shrine token during this usage of this Stratagem. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One YNNARI INFANTRY or YNNARI MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase, just after a YNNARI INFANTRY unit from your army has selected its targets.
body.target: That YNNARI INFANTRY unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If your unit is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Shooting phase.
body.target: One YNNARI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units), if one or more models in that unit were destroyed this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One YNNARI unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of one or more objective markers you controlled at the end of the previous phase. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Select one of those objective markers. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One TROUPE unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a HARLEQUINS unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That HARLEQUINS unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
body.restriction: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS INFANTRY or HARLEQUINS MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One HARLEQUINS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army.
body.target: One WAR WALKERS unit from your army.
body.effect: After that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks, it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: If your unit is within range of one or more objective markers, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within range of one or more objective markers, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One STORM GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One GUARDIANS unit from your army.
body.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. When doing so, return every destroyed GUARDIANS model to your unit.

body.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One HOWLING BANSHEES or STRIKING SCORPIONS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if it made a Charge move this turn, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS, FIRE DRAGONS, SWOOPING HAWKS or WARP SPIDERS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army (excluding CHARACTER units).
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, at the end of your turn, select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of Avenger shuriken catapults, shuriken catapults, shuriken pistols and shuriken cannons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIAN DEFENDERS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit opens a Hatchway.
body.target: One DIRE AVENGERS or GUARDIANS unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase and is wholly on the opposite side of that Hatchway from that enemy unit.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within 9" of and visible to your unit, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. If that enemy unit suffers one or more mortal wounds in this way, your unit can then make a Normal move of up to D6”.
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot fire Overwatch.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to shoot this phase and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Roll six D6: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to your model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that has not been selected to move this phase, was not set up on the battlefield this phase, and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.
body.restriction: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to be selected to move.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 9" of one or more friendly ASURYANI PSYKER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units] that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHLORD or WRAITHKNIGHT unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each WRAITHBLADES model in your unit, or roll four D6 if your unit has the WRAITHLORD keyword, or roll six D6 if your unit has the WRAITHKNIGHT keyword: for each 3+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One AELDARI PSYKER model from your army and one friendly WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit within 12" of it that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your PSYKER model. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Armour Penetration and/or Damage characteristics of that attack.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit from your army and one ASURYANI PSYKER model from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your WRAITHBLADES, WRAITHGUARD or WRAITHLORD unit is considered to be within 12" of your PSYKER model for the purposes of the Psychic Guidance and Spirit Guides abilities.

body.when: Start of your Movement phase.
body.target: One WRAITHBLADES or WRAITHGUARD unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed, and each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, models in your unit can move through other models as if they were not there.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an AELDARI unit from your army destroys an enemy unit.
body.target: That AELDARI unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3" and, if it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units that are visible to it (and in Unit Coherency), it can still make that Consolidation move, and when doing so can move in any direction.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army (excluding WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability while targeting an enemy unit within 12". If such a weapon already has that ability, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with that weapon, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ASURYANI unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ASURYANI unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges.
body.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI unit from your army and one friendly TRANSPORT it is able to embark within.
body.effect: If your ASURYANI unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and is wholly within 6" of that TRANSPORT, it can embark within it.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an ASURYANI INFANTRY unit from your army (excluding AIRCRAFT, ASURMEN and WRAITH CONSTRUCT units) has shot.
body.target: That ASURYANI unit.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6+1".
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that was set upon the battlefield from Reserves this turn and has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army in Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield from Reserves, it can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units. When doing so, if your unit is set up within 9" horizontally of one or more enemy units, until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED or VYPER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

body.when: End of your Shooting phase or the end of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ASURYANI MOUNTED unit from your army that destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 7".

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the attacking model is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic and/or to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One WRAITH CONSTRUCT unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway that is visible to and within range of one or more of the ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit. Open that Hatchway and, until the end of the battle, that Hatchway cannot be closed. For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, until the start of your next Shooting phase, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
body.restriction: Until the end of the phase, your unit is not eligible to shoot.

body.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One AELDARI unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified G.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a Save characteristic of 3+.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE INFANTRY or LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE MOUNTED unit from your army (excluding units that Fell Back this turn) that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA KHORNE unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge. Note that even if that charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One INFANTRY LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1. In addition, until the end of the phase, each time such a weapon targets a unit that is Battle-shocked, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: End of your opponent’s turn.
body.target: Up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA units from your army that are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos, or one other LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
body.effect: Remove the targeted units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. They will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
body.restriction: You cannot target units that are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units with this Stratagem.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of that enemy unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an invulnerable saving throw is made for a model in your unit, re-roll a saving throw of 1.

body.when: Start of any Command phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Corrupted and remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. In addition, while an objective marker is Corrupted and under your control, the area of the battlefield within 6" of that objective marker is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, Desperate Escape tests taken for models in your unit are automatically passed and your unit does not suffer mortal wounds from the Lithe Killers Detachment rule.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SLAANESH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your armyFalls Back.
body.target: That SLAANESH unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to be selected to fight as if that Hatchway was open. When doing so, that unit can select targets as if that Hatchway was open (that Hatchway is only considered to be open for your unit, not for any other units).

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One KHORNE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or roll six D6 instead if your unit is a MONSTER unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit or up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH units (excluding MONSTERS) from your army that have not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in one of those units makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

body.when: Any phase, just after an attack or mortal wound is allocated to a model in a LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit from your army (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES).
body.target: That LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit.
body.effect: Select one other friendly LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH unit that is within 9" of and visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, while the selected unit is on the battlefield, each time a model in your unit would lose a wound, inflict 1 mortal wound on the selected unit instead.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA SLAANESH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Each unit on the battlefield that is within your army’s Shadow of Chaos must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if they are Below Half-strength.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem forces all friendly and enemy units alike within your army’s Shadow of Chaos to take a Battle-shock test. This can allow a Chaos Daemons player to heal units from their army through the Daemonic Terror army rule, at the risk of causing some of their own units to become Battle-shocked.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, you can re-roll saving throws of 1 made for models in your unit.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army has shot.
body.target: That TZEENTCH unit.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One HORRORS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [HAZARDOUS] abilities.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One TZEENTCH LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal move, add 5" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. After your unit has finished making its attacks, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase, before selecting any targets for the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock test as a result of the Melancholic Miasma Detachment rule, select one other enemy unit within 9" of your unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA NURGLE unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Return up to 1 destroyed model to your unit, or up to D3 destroyed models instead if your unit is a BATTLELINE unit, with their full wounds remaining. If it is a MONSTER unit, one model in your unit regains up to D3+1 lost wounds instead.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army (excluding NURGLINGS units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

body.when: End of the Fight phase, or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. If this Stratagem is used in your opponent’s Shooting phase, it must target a unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Select one objective marker your unit is within range of. Your unit suffers D3 mortal wounds and that objective marker is Secured by your army. If your unit is a PLAGUEBEARERS unit, it only suffers 1 mortal wound, instead of D3.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
body.target: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one of more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move of up to D6".

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NURGLE LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight that phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of weapons equipped by models in your unit, or spend one Flux token and add 3 to the Strength characteristic of those weapons and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 instead.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH MONSTER unit from your army that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Select No Man’s Land or your opponent’s deployment zone, or spend one Flux token and select both. Until the end of the phase, the selected areas of the battlefield are within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units. Alternatively, you can spend one Flux token when you use this Stratagem and target up to two LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH units from your army instead (including those within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units).
body.effect: Remove your units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets for, and resolving attacks with, ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model is destroyed while its unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a move, it can move through terrain features.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LEGIONES DAEMONICA TZEENTCH unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Roll one D6, then you can spend one Flux token to re-roll the result: until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll (after any re-roll) of that result, the attack sequence ends, even if the original Hit roll would have been a Critical Hit.Example: If you roll a 2 and choose to spend one Flux token to re-roll the result, and the re-roll is a 6, then until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, on an unmodified Hit roll of 6 the attack sequence ends, that attack fails to hit and no Critical Hit effects (e.g. Lethal Hits) are resolved.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army.
body.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds. In addition, If your unit has the TZEENTCH keyword, return up to one destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to your unit with its full wounds remaining.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: Up to one SHADOW LEGION HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army and up to one SHADOW LEGION LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. You can only select units that arrived from Reserves this turn.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your selected units have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
body.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit. In addition, if your unit has the NURGLE keyword, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to one SHADOW LEGION HERETIC ASTARTES unit from your army and up to one SHADOW LEGION LEGIONES DAEMONICA unit from your army. You can only select units that are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove those selected units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One SHADOW LEGION unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If your unit has the KHORNE keyword, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1 as well.

body.when: Any phase, just after a SHADOW LEGION unit from your army is destroyed, before removing the last model in that unit from the battlefield and before rolling any dice for the Deadly Demise ability.
body.target: That SHADOW LEGION unit. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit that is within Engagement Range of the last model in your unit, adding 2 to the result if your unit has the SLAANESH keyword: on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: If your unit was set up on the battlefield this turn, it can perform a Tactical Manoeuvre this phase as if it was not set up on the battlefield this turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one objective marker within Contagion Range of and visible to your unit. That objective marker is Secured by your army.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once and, until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to shoot or declare a charge.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD Attached unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Toughness characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase, before the Reinforcements step.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD CHARACTER unit from your army that is not leading a unit.
body.effect: Select one other friendly DEATH GUARD unit (excluding Battle-shocked units and Attached units that already have two Leader units or one of your CHARACTER units leading it] within 2" horizontally and 5" vertically of your unit that your unit can lead (as described in the Leader section of its datasheet]. Your unit attaches to that unit as a Leader. Change that unit’s Starting Strength accordingly.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that includes two CHARACTER models.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Fights First ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One BIOLOGUS PUTRIFIER unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit (excluding VEHICLES) that is within 8" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that unit has the effect of all Plagues (see Nurgle’s Gift).

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Start of any phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 3" to the Contagion Range of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LORD OF VIRULENCE model from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker within 30" of and visible to your model. Until the start of your next turn, while an enemy unit is within range of that objective marker, that unit is Afflicted.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [HEAVY] abilities.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a TERMINATOR unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That TERMINATOR unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One TERMINATOR unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Start or end of any turn, when an enemy unit attempts to Seize an objective marker you have Secured.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) within Contagion Range of that objective marker.
body.effect: Roll one D6: on a 5+, until the end of your next turn, that objective marker remains Secured by your army and you are considered to control it, regardless of how many enemy models are within range of it.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more friendly MYPHITIC BLIGHT-HAULER units and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
