body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in this unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit within half range, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army makes a Charge move.
body.target: That DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES). Roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that unit, adding 1 to the result if that model is not a CULTIST or POXWALKER model: for each 5+, the selected enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit (excluding Blast weapons) have the [PISTOL] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a visible enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT) within your opponent’s deployment zone, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as the target of a charge, subtract 2 from the Charge roll (this is not cumulative with any other negative modifiers to that Charge roll).

body.when: End of your Movement phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one terrain feature within 24" of and visible to your unit. Until the start of your next turn, enemy units are Afflicted while they are within 3" of that terrain feature.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker visible to one or more models in your unit. Each Afflicted enemy unit within range of that objective marker must take a Battle-shock test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, and add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that made one or more attacks that targeted your unit this phase. Until the end of the battle, that enemy unit is Afflicted.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has fought, roll one D6 for each model from your unit that was destroyed as a result of those attacks: on a 6, the attacking unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If your unit is not destroyed after the attacking unit has fought, enemy models destroyed as a result of this Stratagem count as enemy models destroyed by an attack made by a model in your unit for the purposes of the Curse of the Walking Pox ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, and one friendly POXWALKERS unit within 3" of your unit and visible to both your unit and the attacking unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time you would allocate an attack to a model in your DEATH GUARD unit, if your POXWALKERS unit is visible to the attacking model and is an eligible target for that attack, no saving throw is made for that attack; instead a number of POXWALKERS from your POXWALKERS unit equal to the Damage characteristic of that attack are destroyed.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a DEATH GUARD unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That DEATH GUARD unit.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

body.when: The Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that is in Strategic Reserves and that is not an Attached unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more PLAGUE LEGIONS units from your army, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One NURGLINGS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can target that unit with this Stratagem even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Add a new unit to your army identical to your destroyed unit, in Strategic Reserves, at its Starting Strength and with its full wounds remaining.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, while an enemy unit is within 6" of your unit, that enemy unit is Afflicted.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units are not considered to be within Engagement Range of your unit for the purposes of selecting targets of ranged weapons. Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model loses a wound, while that model’s unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, roll one D6: on a 5+, your unit suffers 1 mortal wound after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, when an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One PLAGUE LEGIONS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, while an enemy unit is within Engagement Range of your unit, each time that unit is selected to Fall Back, it must take a Leadership test. If that test is failed, that unit must Remain Stationary this phase instead.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Your opponent's Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: After that enemy unit ends that Fall Back move, if your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, your unit can make a Normal move.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD CULTISTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Select one closed Hatchway within 1” of your unit. Your unit can attempt to operate that Hatchway.
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within Contagion Range of one or more units from your army, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

body.when: Your Movement phase, when a DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) attempts to open a Hatchway.
body.target: That DEATH GUARD unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 1" of your unit and on the opposite side of that Hatchway from your unit, and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds. Until the end of the phase, if an enemy unit attempts to prevent that Hatchway from being opened, when rolling off, you can re-roll your result.

body.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
body.target: One POXWALKERS unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Deep Strike ability.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after a DEATH GUARD unit from your army (excluding CULTISTS and POXWALKERS units) has shot or fought.
body.target: That DEATH GUARD unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that had one or more models destroyed as a result of those attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: Your DEATH GUARD WARLORD that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 3" to the Contagion Range of models from your army.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD model your army that has lost one or more wounds.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 3" of your model. Roll a number of D6 equal to the number of wounds your model has lost: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers one mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds) and your model regains 1 lost wound (to a maximum of 6 lost wounds).

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD VEHICLE or DEATH GUARD MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted. In addition, any enemy units that suffer mortal wounds as a result of this Stratagem are Afflicted until the start of your next turn.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an Afflicted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One DEATH GUARD CHARACTER unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time a DEATH GUARD unit from your army selects that enemy unit as the target of any ranged attacks, you can re-roll the dice to determine how many attacks a weapon equipped by a model in that unit makes.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS WALKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem lets players utilise abilities that retain control of objective markers and react to their missions and objectives with this unit.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. If the result is greater than the current battle round number, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: The Reinforcements step of your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is within 12" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER or PALADIN SQUAD unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker within 9” of and visible to your unit. If that objective marker does not have any enemy models within range of it (excluding Battle-shocked models), your unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 1 from the result if that objective marker is Secured by your opponent’s army. If that test is passed, that objective marker is no longer considered Secured by your opponent’s army and is Secured by your army.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of storm bolters equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: End of any phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is on the battlefield and suffered one or more mortal wounds this phase.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit which inflicted one or more mortal wounds on your unit this phase, then roll a number of dice equal to the number of mortal wounds your unit suffered this phase: for each 2+, that enemy unit suffers one mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). These mortal wounds are Psychic Attacks.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against attacks with an unmodified Damage characteristic of 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-CHAOS 4+] ability.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6" or, if it has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER model from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, enemy units that are set up on the battlefield as Reinforcements cannot be set up within 12" horizontally of your model.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit has the Stealth ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that was set up using the Deep Strike ability this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Set your unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units, but until the end of the turn, it is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, Psychic weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more GREY KNIGHTS units from your army Falls Back.
body.target: One of those GREY KNIGHTS units that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: If your unit has the Deep Strike ability, it can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: If every model in your unit has the Deep Strike ability, remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.Designer’s Note: This Stratagem allows you to remove a unit in addition to those removed using the Gate of Infinity rule, and it allows you to remove a unit within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, storm bolter weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PISTOL] and [TWIN-LINKED] abilities.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS TERMINATOR unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That GREY KNIGHTS unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Any phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.
body.target: That GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER VEHICLE unit from your army.
body.effect: One model in your unit regains up to 3 lost wounds.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to move or charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE unit.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 3" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in that enemy unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Your Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that charged this turn.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If such a weapon already has that ability, until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made with that weapon, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One INTERCEPTOR SQUAD or GREY KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase and that is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1, or, re-roll the Wound roll instead if your unit is a PURIFIER SQUAD.

body.when: Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit (excluding TERMINATOR units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Set up your unit wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground and more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Movement phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 6" of your unit, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if your unit is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit that are wholly within your Hallowed Ground have a 4+ invulnerable save.

body.when: Start of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit declares a charge and your unit is one of the targets of that charge, subtract 1 from the Charge roll, or subtract 2 instead if your unit is wholly within your army’s Hallowed Ground.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One PURIFIER SQUAD unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
body.effect: Roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of your unit, adding 1 to the result if your unit includes CASTELLAN CROWE: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed by the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that started the phase within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move, but must end that move as close as possible to that enemy unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has just destroyed an enemy unit, or just caused an enemy unit that was not Below Half-strength to become Below Half-strength.
body.effect: Your unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One DESTROYER CULT or FLAYED ONES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model from your unit makes an attack that targets a unit below Starting Strength, add 1 to the Hit roll. If the target is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit within half range, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll the Hit roll for that attack instead.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. In addition, If a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1. (this is not cumulative with any other modifiers that improve Armour Penetration].

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One NECRONS INFANTRY CHARACTER model from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with half of its starting number of wounds remaining.
body.restriction: Each model can only be targeted with this Stratagem once per battle.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit destroys a NECRONS unit from your army.
body.target: One NECRONS CHARACTER unit from your army that was within 6" of that NECRONS unit when it was destroyed.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has resolved its attacks, your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit activates its Reanimation Protocols and reanimates D3 wounds (or D3+1 wounds if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit].

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. In addition, if a NECRONS CHARACTER is leading your unit, until the end of the phase, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
body.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that was destroyed by one of the attacking unit’s attacks. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly CANOPTEK model makes an attack that targets the attacking unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: The start of your Shooting phase or the start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One CRYPTEK or CANOPTEK unit from your army that is wholly within your army’s Power Matrix.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by CRYPTEK or CANOPTEK models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker within 18" of your CRYPTEK model. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by friendly NECRONS models have the [IGNORES COVER] ability while targeting units within range of that objective marker.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
body.target: One CANOPTEK unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge and is wholly within your army’s Power Matrix.
body.effect: Your unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: End of your Movement phase.
body.target: One CRYPTEK unit from your army.
body.effect: For each open Hatchway within 3" of your unit, you can close that Hatchway.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One CANOPTEK WRAITHS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: The next time your unit is selected to move this phase, models in that unit can move through Walls and closed Hatchways as if they were not there, but when doing so, no model can move more than 6".
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One CRYPTEK model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model has a 4+ invulnerable save.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DESTROYER CULT unit from your army opens a Hatchway.
body.target: That DESTROYER CULT unit.
body.effect: For each enemy unit within 3" of that Hatchway, if that Hatchway is visible to that unit and that unit is wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit, that unit must take a Leadership test, subtracting 2 from the result: if failed, until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit has the FLAYED ONES keyword, each time it moves, models in that unit can move through friendly DESTROYER CULT models as if they were not there. If your unit has the DESTROYER CULT keyword, models in it can move through friendly FLAYED ONES models as if they were not there.

body.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
body.target: One FLAYED ONES unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Deep Strike ability.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by a DESTROYER CULT unit from your army
body.target: That DESTROYER CULT unit.
body.effect: Select one objective marker that your unit or the destroyed unit was within range of at the start of the phase. That objective marker is Secured by your army.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: Your NECRONS WARLORD.
body.effect: For each of your NECRONS units in Reserves, that Reserves unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding MONSTER units) that is arriving using the Deep Strike or Hyperphasing abilities this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
body.restriction: A unit targeted with this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield this turn using the Eternity Gate ability of a MONOLITH model that started the turn on the battlefield.
body.effect: Your unit is eligible to charge this phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has shot or fought.
body.target: One NECRONS INFANTRY unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks and one friendly MONOLITH model.
body.effect: Remove your INFANTRY unit from the battlefield and then set it back up anywhere on the battlefield that is wholly within 6" of your MONOLITH model and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One TITANIC model from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is within 18" of the attacking unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in the attacking unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Any phase, just after your opponent’s WARLORD is destroyed.
body.target: Your NECRONS WARLORD.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an enemy unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from the result.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH PRAETORIANS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One LYCHGUARD or TRIARCH unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. If your unit has the VEHICLE keyword, add 3 to the Objective Control characteristic instead.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets a model in your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if the target of that attack is within range of one or more objective markers, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One NECRONS VEHICLE or NECRONS MOUNTED unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit can move horizontally through models and terrain features.

body.when: End of your Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit (excluding TITANIC units) from your army that is within range of one or more objective markers you control.
body.effect: Your unit’s Reanimation Protocols activate.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6".

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One NECRONS unit from your army that is Set to Defend and has not fought this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One NECRON WARRIORS or IMMORTALS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an enemy unit attempts to prevent a NECRONS unit from you army from operating a closed Hatchway.
body.target: That NECRONS unit.
body.effect: Roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: When that enemy unit Falls Back, all models in that enemy unit must take a Desperate Escape test. When doing so, if a Waaagh! is active for your unit, subtract 1 from each of those tests.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound for each 4+ instead.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed.
body.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that destroyed that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Consolidation move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If a Waaagh! is active for your unit, it can move up to 6" instead.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One NOBZ or MEGANOBZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not shot or fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if a Waaagh! is active for your unit. On a 5+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can shoot or fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY or BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack targets your unit, models in your unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack. In addition, if your unit has the INFANTRY keyword, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. In addition, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets your Prey, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army ends a Charge move.
body.target: That BEAST SNAGGA unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each model in your unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds). If that enemy unit is your Prey, roll three additional D6.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy unit.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Fall Back move.
body.target: One BEAST SNAGGA INFANTRY or BEAST SNAGGA MOUNTED unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
body.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One BEAST SNAGGA unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back. In addition, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit, provided one of the targets of that charge is your Prey.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ORKS WALKER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit and, if you chose to push it, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of those weapons and they have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One MEK, ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE, add 1 to the Wound roll. If you chose to push it, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Each time you use this Stratagem, you can choose to push it. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If you chose to push it, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead and, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability as well.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ORKS WALKER or GROTS VEHICLE unit from your army (excluding TITANIC units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.target: That ORKS WALKER unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your unit and ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One GRETCHIN unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units.
body.effect: Roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3+1 mortal wounds. Your unit can then make a Normal move.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit contains 10 or more models, re-roll the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to fight, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in your unit that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit declares a charge, add 1 to the Charge roll and, if your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the Charge roll.’

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: Two BOYZ units from your army that are within 6" of each other.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, while those two units are within 6" of each other, they both count as containing 10 or more models for the purposes of your Detachment rule, any Enhancements models from your army have and any Stratagems you use.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army.
body.effect: Return up to D3+2 destroyed models to your unit (excluding CHARACTER models).

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: After the attacking unit has shot, your unit can make a Go Get ’Em! move. To do so, roll one D6: each model in your unit can move a distance in inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit. If your unit contains 10 or more models, you can re-roll the D6 to determine how far your unit can move.

body.effect: Your unit can fight as if it were the Fight phase, but when doing so, models in your unit can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit.

body.when: Your Charge phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. If your unit is a VEHICLE unit with an unmodified Toughness characteristic of 8 or less, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save instead.

body.target: One SPEED FREEKS unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that enemy unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.

body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your unit’s Move, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1, and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army (excluding GRETCHIN units).
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, the Waaagh! is active for your unit, even if you have already called a Waaagh! this battle.Designer’s Note: This means that any abilities that are in effect while the Waaagh! is active for your army will be in effect for your unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 18", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One BOYZ unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can make an Enraged Rush move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a distance in inches up to the result, but must end that move as close as possible to the attacking unit. When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, but only that enemy unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.

body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced and each time your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll; instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ORKS unit from your army opens a Hatchway.

body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit has the Fights First ability.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after a STORMBOYZ unit from your army ends a Charge move.

body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit, then roll one D6 for each model in your unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

body.target: One ORKS INFANTRY or ORKS MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] or [LETHAL HITS] ability. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit Falls Back.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that was within Engagement Range of that enemy unit at the start of the phase.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the start of the next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.

body.target: That ORKS unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.target: One KOMMANDOS or STORMBOYZ unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army (excluding GROTS, MONSTER and VEHICLE units) that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One MOB unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half-strength.
body.effect: Select one friendly Battle-shocked ORKS INFANTRY unit within 6" of that MOB unit. That ORKS INFANTRY unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Start of your Movement phase.
body.target: One ORKS INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for your unit.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ORKS VEHICLE unit from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
body.target: That destroyed ORKS VEHICLE unit, if you roll a 6 for its Deadly Demise ability. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this move, your unit can move over enemy units (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) as if they were not there.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ORKS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, that is on your defensive line and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit on your defensive line, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: Up to two IMPERIAL KNIGHTS units from your army that have not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 3" to the Move characteristic of models in your units.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that Remained Stationary this turn, that is on your defensive line and that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability.

body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that is on your defensive line.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy unit selects your unit as a target of a charge, that unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks and is on your defensive line.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greaterthan the Toughness characteristic of your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll
