body.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit.
body.effect: When selecting targets for that use of that Bondsman ability, you can select one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit within 12" of your unit in addition, or instead of selecting one ARMIGER model. Until the start of your next Command phase, every model in that ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit is affected by that Bondsman ability.
body.restriction: You cannot target a KNIGHT PRECEPTOR with this Stratagem.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS CHARACTER unit from your army and one friendly ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit that is within 6" of that unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your units have the [ASSAULT] ability.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, the enemy unit that destroyed your unit is Marked. Each time an ADEPTUS MECHANICUS model from your army makes an attack that targets a Marked unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

body.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit from your army.
body.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS or ADEPTUS MECHANICUS unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that is within 24" of and visible to that enemy unit.
body.effect: Select one ranged weapon equipped by a model in your unit. That model can shoot at that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target). When doing so, that model can only make attacks with that weapon and each time it makes a ranged attack, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit, irrespective of the attacking weapon’s Ballistic Skill or any modifiers.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next turn, your unitcan ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any Hit roll or Wound roll made for it.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER, TITANIC or WALKER unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase, just before an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army Consolidates.
body.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit Consolidates, models in it can move an additional 3" provided your unit can end that move within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: Your Level of Control over that objective marker is 5 (unless it would otherwise be higher), until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ARMIGER model from your army, or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army, and one or more friendly ARMIGER models affected by that model’s Bondsman ability.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by your ARMIGER models have the [RAPID FIRE 1] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after an IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army has shot.
body.target: That IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model, and one or more friendly ARMIGER models affected by that model’s Bondsman ability.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time one of your ARMIGER models makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ARMIGER model from your army, or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army, and one or more friendly ARMIGER models affected by that model’s Bondsman ability.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit. Until the end of the phase, each time one of your ARMIGER models makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ARMIGER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking units attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ARMIGER model from your army, or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army, and one or more friendly ARMIGER models affected by that model’s Bondsman ability.
body.effect: For each of your ARMIGER models that is within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, remove that ARMIGER model from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Start of your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ARMIGER model from your army, or one IMPERIAL KNIGHTS TITANIC model from your army, and one or more friendly ARMIGER models affected by that model’s Bondsman ability.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your ARMIGER models are eligible to shoot in a turn in which they Fell Back.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, the Attacks characteristic of any armoured Feet melee weapons equipped by your model is 8, the Attacks characteristic of any titanic Feet melee weapons equipped by your model is 12, and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of those weapons by 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2" to the Move characteristic of your models and add 2 to Advance rolls made for those model’s units.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by your models have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS model from your army that is within 9" of that unit.
body.effect: Your model can make a Normal move of up to D6".

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by your models have the [LANCE] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One IMPERIAL KNIGHTS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is Below Half-strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves. It will arrive back on the battlefield in the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase using the Deep Strike ability.
body.restriction: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that made a Charge move this turn and destroyed one or more enemy units this phase.
body.effect: In your opponent’s next Command phase, each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test. If the unit taking that test is Below Half-strength, subtract 1 from that test. Enemy units affected by this Stratagem do not need to take any other Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If your unit is a CHARACTER unit, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the [LANCE] ability as well.

cards.title: IN THE SHADOW OF GREAT WINGS

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one non-CHARACTER model in your unit. Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword.Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Legacy of the Angel Detachment rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, unless it is THE SANGUINOR.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If your unit Remained Stationary this turn, then until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Fall Back move of up to 6".
body.restriction: When making that move, your unit must end that move either wholly within your deployment zone or within range of an objective marker.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army within range of an objective marker.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, double the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit, but it must Remain Stationary this turn.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army, if those units are not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves. Until the end of your next Movement phase, models in those units that do not have the Deep Strike ability have the Deep Strike ability.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: Up to two KILL TEAM units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: For each unit targeted, select Furor Tactics, Malleus Tactics or Purgatus Tactics. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Mission Tactic is active for that unit instead of any Mission Tactic that is active for your army.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.
body.restriction: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and improve the Range characteristic of those weapons by 6".
body.restriction: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Dragonfire Rounds or Hellfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One KILL TEAM unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons (excluding Devastating Wounds weapons) equipped by models in your unit have the [ANTI-INFANTRY 2+] and [ANTI-MONSTER 5+] abilities.
body.restriction: You cannot select any units that have already been targeted with either the Kraken Rounds or Dragonfire Rounds Stratagems this phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker and was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES BATTLELINE unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select any number of models in your unit. Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by the selected models and each time you select targets for attacks made by those models, they must target an enemy unit that is wholly on the opposite side of a Hatchway from them.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army declares a charge.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Each target of that charge must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit has the BATTLELINE keyword: on a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] abilities. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have that ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: End of your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
body.effect: Each enemy unit within 6" of your unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if that unit is Below Half-strength.

body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Stealth ability.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted with this and the Hearts Hardened to Duty Stratagem in the same phase unless it has the CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR keywords.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets an enemy unit, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that target is a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1 as well.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Fight phase, just before an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Consolidates.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Consolidation move, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model (or the closest enemy unit if the Suffer Not the Unclean to Live Vow is active for it).

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One CHAPLAIN or JUDICIAR unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Retribution move. To do so, roll one D6: models in your unit move a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
body.effect: That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army that has just shot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if one or more RAVENWING units from your army are within 6" of that enemy unit, subtract 1 from the test.

body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY CHARACTER or MOUNTED CHARACTER unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One RAVENWING MOUNTED unit from your army that is within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of such weapons by 1.

body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.

body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. If your unit is below its Starting Strength, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR, BLADEGUARD VETERAN SQUAD, STERNGUARD VETERAN SQUAD or VANGUARD VETERAN SQUAD unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any phase.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target within 12", add 1 to the Hit roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army Falls Back.

cards.title: ONLY IN DEATH DOES DUTY END

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or a Normal move of up to 6" instead if it is under the effects of the Tactical Doctrine.
body.restriction: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Select the Devastator Doctrine, Tactical Doctrine or Assault Doctrine. Until the start of your next Command phase, that Combat Doctrine is active for that unit instead of any other Combat Doctrine that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that doctrine this battle.

body.when: Your Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that TRANSPORT has the LAND RAIDER keyword, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: End of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was eligible to fight this phase.
body.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". It cannot embark within a TRANSPORT at the end of this move if it disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.

body.when: Your Charge phase, just after you make a Charge roll for an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit makes a Charge move, models in your unit can move through models (when doing so, its models can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but they can only end that move within Engagement Range of enemy models if those enemy models belong to a unit that your unit declared a charge against this turn).

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your model makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One LAND RAIDER model from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit embarked within your LAND RAIDER can disembark. When doing so, models in that unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield wholly within 6" of your LAND RAIDER and can be set up within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than your unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that just ended a Charge move.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6 for each model in your unit, adding 1 to the result if that enemy unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 3 mortal wounds).

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 if your unit is within range of your Vowed objective marker. On a 4+, do not remove the destroyed model from play; it can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models.
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is below its Starting Strength.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit can ignore any or all modifiers to its characteristics and/or to any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets a unit that is below its Starting Strength, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and when making such an attack, if the attacking model is a VEHICLE, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES WALKER model from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, improve your model’s Move, Toughness, Leadership and Objective Control characteristics by 1 and each time your model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just charged by an enemy unit.
body.effect: Select either the Strength or Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit. Until the end of the turn, add 1 to the selected characteristic. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Select either the [LANCE] or [LETHAL HITS] abilities. Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, then it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge even though it Fell Back. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Fell Back.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an Adeptus Astartes unit from your army has Advanced.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to either shoot or declare a charge, even though it Advanced. You can instead choose for your unit to give in to the Red Thirst; if it does, it becomes Battle-shocked (but the effects of this Stratagem still apply to it) and until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to both shoot and declare a charge, even though it Advanced.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army has a mortal wound allocated to it.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability, and the [IGNORES COVER] ability as well if the Divination Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit that is within 18" of and visible to one PSYKER model in your unit. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it. In addition, if the Telepathy Discipline is active for your army, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more friendly ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models, and that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and if the Pyromancy Discipline is active for your army, weapons that target your unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER unit from your army that is eligible to shoot.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to one or more PSYKER models in your unit (excluding units with the Lone Operative ability), and roll six D6, adding 1 to each result if the Telekinesis Discipline is active for your army: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that is within 18" of one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES PSYKER models from your army and has not been selected to Fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit, or add 2 if the Biomancy Discipline is active for your army.

body.when: Your Shooting phase, just after a RAVENWING unit from your army has selected its targets.
body.target: That RAVENWING unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" of your unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly DEATHWING unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more RAVENWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that enemy unit is within Engagement Range of one or more DEATHWING units from your army, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of the target, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
body.restriction: A unit cannot be targeted by this and the Armour of Contempt Stratagem in the same phase.

body.when: Command phase or the start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. When doing so, if your unit has the DEATHWING or RAVENWING keyword, subtract 1 from the result.
body.restriction: You can only use this Stratagem once per battle round.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One DEATHWING INFANTRY or DEATHWING WALKER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One RAVENWING unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance or Charge move, it can move horizontally through terrain features.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army is selected to Fall Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of your unit and roll one D6: on a 2-4, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 5+, that enemy unit suffers 2 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time your unit is selected to make a Normal or Advance move, it can attempt to operate one Hatchway it is within 1” of either at the start or end of that move. If it does, it cannot attempt to operate a Hatchway again this turn.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One WULFEN INFANTRY or BLOOD CLAWS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after that enemy unit has shot, if one or more models in your unit were destroyed as a result of those attacks, your unit can make an Impetuous move. To do so, roll one D6: your unit can be moved a number of inches up to the result, but your unit must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). When doing so, those models can be moved within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6". If your unit has the SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY keywords, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" instead.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One THUNDERWOLF CAVALRY unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height. When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit from your army that is wholly within 9" of one or more battlefield edges and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove your unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, after your unit has shot, select one enemy CHARACTER, MONSTER, or VEHICLE unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next Shooting phase, that unit is pinned. While a unit is pinned, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for it.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is allocated to a model in your unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES CHARACTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One Wolf Guard Headtaker or Wolf Guard Terminator Pack Leader model from your army.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, your model has the CHARACTER keyword.Designer’s Note: While in effect, your model’s unit is therefore a CHARACTER unit, meaning it can interact with the Heroes All rule, in addition to other rules that interact with CHARACTER units.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army (excluding BEASTS) that have not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit visible to both of your units. Until the end of the phase, models in your units can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target) and each time a model in one of your units makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: Two ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit, or one SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES) from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One SPACE WOLVES INFANTRY or SPACE WOLVES BEASTS unit from your army that has not been selected to move or declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, it can move through models (excluding TITANIC models). When doing so, it can move within Engagement Range of enemy models, but unless it is making a Charge move, it cannot end that move within Engagement Range of them.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a SPACE WOLVES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That SPACE WOLVES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit is destroyed by an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Select one objective marker you control that your unit is within range of. That objective marker remains under your control until your opponent’s Level of Control over that objective marker is greater than yours at the end of a phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of the enemy unit that just ended that move. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two PHOBOS and/or SCOUT SQUAD units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army. You cannot target a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit, it is also eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [ASSAULT] ability. If such a weapon already has this ability, until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability as well.

body.when: Your Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for your unit and melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LANCE] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES FLY VEHICLE unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your opponent’s Movement phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that is within 9" of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".
body.restriction: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED or ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE unit (excluding WALKERS) from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, if your unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit, or 9" instead if your unit is MOUNTED.

body.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR SQUAD unit from your army that has not fired Overwatch this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack while firing Overwatch, an unmodified Hit roll of 5+ is required to score a hit, instead of an unmodified 6.

body.when: Your Movement phase or your Charge phase.
body.target: One TERMINATOR ASSAULT SQUAD unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase and has not declared a charge this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when making a Normal, Advance or Charge move, your unit can move through a single closed Hatchway as if it was open. When doing so, that Hatchway is opened and cannot be closed for the rest of the battle. This can allow that unit to declare a charge against enemy units that are not visible to it, but to do so those enemy units must be within 1" of that Hatchway and wholly on the opposite side of it from your unit.
body.restriction: You cannot use this Stratagem more than once per turn.

body.when: Your Movement phase, at the start of the Reinforcements step.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army that is in Reserves.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when setting up your unit on the battlefield using its Deep Strike ability, you can set it up unit anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy models (measure this distance as you would normally for the Deep Strike ability, ignoring Walls and closed Hatchways).
body.restriction: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

body.when: Start or end of any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES TERMINATOR unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit.
body.restriction: Each time you use this Stratagem, you cannot use it again until after your next Command phase.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] and [PRECISION] abilities.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Start of the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of all of its attacks.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army that is arriving using the Deep Strike ability this phase.
body.effect: Your unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 6" horizontally away from all enemy units.
body.restriction: A unit targeted by this Stratagem is not eligible to declare a charge in the same turn.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit from your army Advances or Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES JUMP PACK unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time a friendly SANGUINARY GUARD unit makes an attack that targets the enemy unit that just destroyed your unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that is below Starting Strength and has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks, Stength and Armour Penetration characteristics of melee weapons equipped by models in your unit by 1 and, unless your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, until the end of the phase, those weapons have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army, just before that unit Piles-in.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile-in move, it can move up to D3+3" instead of up to 3". If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or if it is below Starting Strength, it can move up to 6" instead. In either case, it can only do so provided your unit ends that Pile-in move in Unit Coherency and within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Any phase.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

body.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One DEATH COMPANY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6, adding 1 to the result if your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models; on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after a DEATH COMPANY unit from your army Advances.
body.target: That DEATH COMPANY unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit is within 12" of one or more friendly CHAPLAIN models, or it is below its Starting Strength, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within Engagement Range of that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, if one or more ADEPTUS ASTARTES units from your army are currently Battle-shocked, until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT], [HEAVY] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that had one or more models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

body.when: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army Falls Back.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that is more than 12" away, improve the Ballistic Skill and Armour Penetration characteristics of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
body.target: Up to two PHOBOS and/or SCOUT SQUAD units from your army, or one other ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army.
body.effect: Remove those units from the battlefield and place them into Strategic Reserves.
body.restriction: Each unit selected for this Stratagem must be more than 3" away from all enemy models.

body.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit declares a charge.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge.
body.effect: Your unit can make a Normal move of up to D6", or up to 6" instead if it is a PHOBOS or SCOUT SQUAD unit.
body.restriction: You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.

body.when: Start of the Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army within range of an objective marker you control.
body.effect: That objective marker is said to be Sabotaged, and remains under your control even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn. While an objective marker is Sabotaged and under your control, each time an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move within range of that objective marker, roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

body.when: Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability and each time a model in your unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, if that model’s unit is within range of one or more objective markers or the target unit is within range of one or more objective markers, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Any phase, just after an ANCIENT model from your army is destroyed.
body.target: That ANCIENT model. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
body.effect: At the end of the phase, set your model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
body.restriction: You cannot target the same model with this Stratagem more than once per battle.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit destroys an ANCIENT model from your army that has not been targeted with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army visible to that enemy unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the battle, each time an ADEPTUS ASTARTES model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.
body.restriction: You cannot target that ANCIENT model with the Refusal to Yield Stratagem this phase.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ANCIENT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within 6" of one or more enemy units and would be eligible to declare a charge against one or more of those enemy units if it were your Charge phase.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your Movement phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the RAVENWING keyword, it is also eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Any phase, just after your Oath of Moment target is destroyed.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES CHARACTER unit that is on the battlefield.
body.effect: Select one enemy unit within 12" and visible to your unit. That enemy unit becomes your Oath of Moment target until the start of your next Command phase.

body.when: End of your opponent’s Charge phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army within 3" of one or more enemy units, or one DEATHWING unit from your army within 6" of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that only targets one or more of those enemy units, and you resolve that charge.
body.restriction: Note that even if this charge is successful, your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

body.when: Your Shooting phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in your unit.

body.when: Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in your unit. In addition, until the end of the turn, if your unit does not have the DEATHWING, RAVENWING or VEHICLE keyword, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

body.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
body.effect: Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [PRECISION] ability.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and you can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: that attack’s Weapon Skill characteristic; the Hit roll; the Wound roll.

body.when: Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army.
body.target: That ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.

body.when: Fight phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase and is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
body.effect: Until the end of the phase, when determining which models in your unit are eligible to fight, any models in it that are within 3" of one or more enemy models are eligible to fight. When resolving those attacks, such models can target one of those enemy units that is within 3" of them and within Engagement Range of their unit.

body.when: Your Command phase.
body.target: One ADEPTUS ASTARTES INFANTRY or ADEPTUS ASTARTES MOUNTED unit from your army.
body.effect: Select the Chorus of Relentless Hate, Rite of Perfervid Wrath or Chant of Deathless Devotion Litany. Until the end of the battle round, that Litany is active for your unit instead of any other Litany that is active for your army.
